title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering for QuantumRadar
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the quantum radar system. Conduct comprehensive research on existing quantum radar technologies, identify potential challenges and limitations, gather input from subject matter experts in quantum physics, radar systems, signal processing, and data analysis (expanded scope). Document findings and create a technical proposal detailing the design, architecture, and implementation strategy.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the quantum entanglement source, photon detection and processing components, and data analysis and visualization modules.

title: Quantum Entanglement Module
description: Develop the module responsible for generating and maintaining entangled photon pairs for the radar system.

title: Photon Detection and Processing
description: Implement the components for detecting and processing the reflected entangled photons, including signal processing algorithms and data filtering techniques.

title: Data Analysis and Visualization
description: Develop the modules for analyzing the processed photon data, including object detection, imaging, and visualization techniques.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to relevant security standards and regulations, including data privacy and protection measures.

title: Testing and Validation
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy and implement test cases to validate the functionality and performance of the quantum radar system.

title: Deployment and Integration
description: Plan and execute the deployment of the quantum radar system, including integration with existing infrastructure and systems.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for the quantum radar system.
